helpContent.title: Getting started with the map
helpContent.markdownText:
# Getting started with the map

Hello welcome to the TecRocks World Map. This basic map provides you the opportunity to explore the Rocks of the Earth. Here are some quick tips to get started 

1. Click and drag around the Earth with the left mouse button. Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out
2. Disable map data layers by clicking the small box to the left of the layer title. This can help you orient yourself on the globe. 
3. Change the 'Display Variable' in the World Geology layer to view specific rock types. 
4. Open 'Map Settings' to switch between a flat earth view and a global view.
